title: Display your jungle dominance with Gromp

replies.body: "RP icons won't become the norm, we promise."  "We understand that longtime players need some IP sinks and we're going to give you those options."
I have 20,000 IP right now just from nothing to spend it on. Makes me miss the old Every Two Weeks champion release schedule.
115,000~ IP... Tell me about it
Now we have Chromas. Too bad they're RP. They would had cost around 4000 IP each.
67,000 ip here
Literally 1 ago for URF there were 2 icons available, one for just playing the game and one for IP
1 what ago?
Can you link the statement? I know that they probably said something along the lines of that claim at some point.

if u guys never used rp to buy champs u would still probably have stuff to spend the ip on, iv been playing since season 1 and refuse to buy something that i can just buy with ip.  I still dont have every champ i only need like 4 left and i have like 265 days worth of play time atleast

I've also been playing since S1, and though I only purchased 2 or 3 champs with RP, I own all of them and am running out of things to buy with IP. Everyone's experience is going to be different. If you play a lot (like I do) you are going to run out of stuff to buy with IP pretty quickly.
RUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNEEEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS

Champion icons for Mastery please and thank you.
{{champion:267}}
I approve this message.
i approve this appovation of this message
I approve this approvation of a approvation of this message.
I am Obama and I approve the approvations of these messages.
I'm not Phreak and I approve your approvals approving the approvals of the approval.
I broke the chain, git rekt.
Whats a Gromp?
Hello, sir. Do you have the time to hear of our new-found lord, savior and executioner, Gromp?

Gromp is actually a demigod from another realm come to take the league of legends food chart! Ancient scrolls also cripticly hint towards eternal life for those brave enough to defend gromp should anyone seek to cause him harm - Keyori :D
Bad news: You still have to pay RP for these things.
Good news: Rito gets the money to pay their employees to make new champs and pay for the maintenance of the servers you play on! Everyone is happy!
Bad news: the servers are cursed
The good news is that it comes with a free Frogut!
The frogurt is also cursed

>Grab the Gromp icon for 250 RP

Nope, I'd rather use some of my useless IP but noooooo.

Really, home come there are no IP icons to spend your spare points on? If you want to get lazy just use preexisting images for them, **[sell them for both IP and RP if you wish, like certain other game does.](http://smite.gamepedia.com/Cosmetic_Items#Player_icons)**

250 for one "exclusive" regular icon is not what I'd call worth getting.
I love how Riot _acts _like they listen by saying one side of things but not the other.

"We understand players need IP sinks."
"So...We can get this with IP?"
"...:)"

> [{quoted}](name=NyanNyanNyaaaaan,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=cAio8nsE,comment-id=00170000,timestamp=2015-05-25T22:31:16.377+0000)
>
>  "...:)"

Sona works for Riot? I knew it.
ALL HAIL GROMP
ALL HAIL HYPNO-GROMP
That's stup-ALL GLORY TO THE HYPNOGROMP
Yea no..... I was excited at first then when I saw how much it costs. I'd rather spend my RP on better things then a icon.
Yes! Now I'll have the perfect summoner name and icon.
Are you sure.
Obviously, everyone can relate to my name.
Now with this icon, you can be toxic in the loading screen too!
Can we have an alternate Gromp icon that faces to the right?  That way, some clever people can reenact the "Game Gromps" properly.
We are GROMP
wow... another ugly icon.. can u guys step up your icon and ward game? its utterly terrible
The Gromp isn't supposed to be beautiful.
Like Shrek.
"Sure, Gromp's not the king of the jungle" - Rito pls. Gromp-kamisama is GOD of the jungle. Live and die by the gromp. Gromp is love, Gromp is life.
These beautiful icons are a waste of your artists' talents. The very bottom line is that they should cost influence points rather than real-world money, and that's simply that.

oh come on riot... instead of adding new unlockable content, like "you've to kill thousand times for nashor icon" and "500 times gromp"... nah just let's put it on store on RP price, they give us their money anyway.
gromp mini pet please{{summoner:31}}
I give props to the guy that wrote this. Having to come up with that entire post is amazing with just having gromp as the subject.
Uberdanger is pleased about this.
